item.title: Sharing the Renovate configuration across multiple projects
item.description: Renovate is a tool that helps you to keep your dependencies up-to-date. You can configure Renovate using a configuration file at the root of the repository. In this post, I describe how to share the Renovate configuration across multiple projects. Developers don't like to maintain the same configuration in multiple repositories. It's error-prone and time-consuming.
